content: ADDED:\nSupport for Magento 2.3
CHANGED:\nReorganise unit and integration tests
FIXED:\nAdjust integration test for 2.2.5

ADDED:
Ability to translate more terms (thanks @gediminaskv)
FIXED:
Minor code style issue

CHANGED:
Package name renamed to fooman/printorderpdf-implementation-m2, installation should be via metapackage fooman/printorderpdf-m2
Increased version number by 100 to differentiate from metapackage
FIXED:
Change setTemplate workaround, use area emulation insteadConstructor change in Plugin\PaymentInfoBlockPlugin, removes copied template files
CHANGED:\nAllow for different pdf versions in test
CHANGED:\nAdded preprocessing of tests to run across 2.1/2.2

FIXED:
Empty payment details by providing frontend pdf template for known template files
ADDED:
Added support for PHP 7.1
ADDED:\nSupport for bundled products
CHANGED:\nCompatibility with Magento 2.1, for Magento 2.0 use earlier versions
CHANGED:\nTest improvements
CHANGED:\nChange folder structure to src/ and tests/
ADDED:\nProvide a Pdf Renderer so that Fooman Email Attachments M2 (separate extension) can attach a pdf to outgoing order confirmation emails\nTranslations

CHANGED:
PSR-2
Use Magento repositories and factory
Use Magento massaction
Update code to stay compatible with latest Magento development branch
CHANGED:\nUpdate code to stay compatible with latest Magento development branch
ADDED:\nInitial release for Magento 2
CHANGED:\nReverse 7.1 features as Magento Marketplace does not yet support it
CHANGED:\nUse newer php features (minimum 7.1)

CHANGED:\nAdd compatibility with Magento 2.3.0 and handle upgrade of Zend_Mail, for earlier versions of Magento useprevious versionsConstructor change in Model\EmailEventDispatcher\nexplicitly state Zend\Mime dependency
ADDED:\nAbility to customise affect the final filename
CHANGED:\nReorganised unit tests
CHANGED:\nCode Quality improvement - use class constants
CHANGED:\nFixed integration tests
CHANGED:\nMajor rewrite - removed all preferences, use plugins on TransportBuilder and TransportFactory instead
CHANGED:\nAdjusted tests to provide for Pdf Customiser transforming T&Cs to Pdfs

CHANGED:
Package name renamed to fooman/emailattachments-implementation-m2, installation should be via metapackage fooman/emailattachments-m2
Increased version number by 100 to differentiate from metapackage
Moved attachment code into separate classConstructor change Observer\AbstractObserver
Attachments are also added to emails sent separately
ADDED:\nSupport for PHP 7.1\nSupport for Magento 2.2.0
FIXED:\nMake CheckoutAgreements dependency explicit
ADDED:\nAbility for integration test to check for attachment name
FIXED:\nTranslations of file names (thanks Manuel)
ADDED:\nAdd note to "Attach Order as Pdf" that it requires the Print Order Pdf extension
CHANGED:\nWiden dependencies in preparation for Magento 2.1.0
FIXED:\nAdd missing configuration setting for attaching T&Cs to shipping email
CHANGED:\nRelease for Marketplace
ADDED:\nIntegration tests now support Pdf Customiser supplied attachments
CHANGED:\nChange project folder structure to src/ and tests/ (not applicable for Marketplace version)
ADDED:\nInitial release for Magento 2

ADDED:
Ability to use currency formatting with Custom Product Attribute ColumnsConstructor Change in Fooman\PdfCore\Block\Pdf\Column\Renderer\ProductAttribute
FIXED:
Row Total Column should match Magento when using discounts
CHANGED:
Removed ability to select Tier Price columns

ADDED:
Original Price column
CHANGED:
Allow SKU product attribute to be displayed as it can be different to the ordered SKU
FIXED:\nEnsure Pdf responses are not cached

CHANGED:
Bold quantity if more than 1
FIXED:
Undefined offset notice when printing multiple packing slips with particular pagebreaks
FIXED:\nCheckbox image not loading

SECURITY:
Force update to latest Tcpdf library version
Guard against calls to file_exists for phar stream wrappersAll Constructors using Magento\Framework\Filesystem\Io\File changed to Helper\FileOps
CHANGED:
Reorganise unit tests
Explicitly state all dependencies
FIXED:\nImage in Footer may be get flipped due to page constraints

ADDED:
Ability to set a label row on tableupdated view/frontend/templates/pdf/table.phtml
FIXED:
Null values are not formatted as currency
Property name clash with parent see Fooman\PdfCore\Block\Pdf\Column\Renderer\Currency
ADDED:\nAbility to specify column alignment
FIXED:\nFilename now works for pdf types without increment numbers

ADDED:
New Column Type: Qty Details
Background image can now be suppressed from the adminConstructor Change in \Fooman\PdfCore\Helper\BackgroundImage
FIXED:
Linebreaks in footer content - updated view/frontend/templates/pdf/footer.phtml
CHANGED:\nLocation of custom fonts is now under media/downloadable/pdfcustomfonts
ADDED:\nAbility to upload custom fontschanged constructor in \Fooman\PdfCore\Model\PdfRenderer
FIXED:\nConsistent linebreak on logo placement\nSubtotal column values on invoice and creditmemo
FIXED:\nProduct attributes can have a trailing underscore\nFooter Font and Size now follow settings
FIXED:\nPrevent default array to string conversion
FIXED:\nPrevent double decoding of column config
FIXED:\nPrice Column can now show tax inclusive/exclusive prices simultaneously
FIXED:\nBarcode Column handling of deleting products
FIXED:\nColumns setting can be pre-populated with default values
FIXED:\nPrice Column tax in-/exclusiveness in a multi-store environment
ADDED:\nWeight Column
FIXED:\nAllow linebreak tag in product attribute column
FIXED:\nImage dimensions need to be without unit on php 7.1\napp:config:import with column settings
ADDED:\nPdfRenderer object to fooman_pdfcore_before_write_html event
FIXED:\nApp Emulation needs to force Locale in the back-end
CHANGED:\nRe-organised tests
CHANGED:\nTemplate processing
FIXED:\nMake Footer template change backward compatible
ADDED:\nMake template variables accessible in the footer\nSupport for Php 7.1
ADDED:\nCommon Pdf file handler
FIXED:\nEmpty template during Store Emulation
CHANGED:\nBetter compatibility alignment with Magento php versions\nFurther spacing improvements
FIXED:\nSpacing for barcode column
CHANGED:\nAdded supported php versions

CHANGED:
Improved spacing for images
FIXED:
Magento template filename resolver caches too aggressively

ADDED:
Logo block and helper now accept a maxheight argument
CHANGED:
Implemented some MEQP2 suggestions
FIXED:
Magento template filename resolver caches too aggressively
ADDED:\nAbility to display both order and base currencies simultaneously
FIXED:\nImage file location on invoices,creditmemos and shipments
CHANGED:\nTweaked positioning on integrated label
CHANGED:\nTweaked Image Display

CHANGED:
Configurable product image now displays the simple product's image
ADDED:
New column type: Row Total

CHANGED:
Nicer formatting of tax percentage column
Retrieve price from order item
FIXED:
Footer store id retrieval
FIXED:\nPass through reset param for filename helper
ADDED:\nEmit event in PdfRenderer
ADDED:\nCheckbox Column

ADDED:
Allow filename to be reset
FIXED:
Product attribute values on non order pdfs
FIXED:\nAlternative approach for cron translation fix

ADDED:
Add ability to set a row background color
FIXED:
Explicitly revert emulated design
Use Image call directly to benefit from automatic scaling
Workaround for Magento 2 bug to ensure translation of email pdfs via cron(Changed DocumentRenderer constructor)

FIXED:
Footer block template can be themed
CHANGED:
Allow plugin column listing
ADDED:\nNew getForcedPageOrientation() method for DocumentRendererInterface\nTax Percentage Column
FIXED:\nDefault fallback for Custom column titles
FIXED:\nTax column uses new currency renderer

ADDED:
Custom titles for columns
FIXED:
Price column now follows Magento setting
Magento changed currency renderer

CHANGED:
Document Renderer now uses Template directly instead of via a Factory
ADDED:
Subtotal excluding tax column
FIXED:\nCheck to exclude some product attributes

ADDED:
Background images
FIXED:
Some settings were not multistore capable
getStoreId() added to DocumentRendererInterface
ADDED:\nSupport Product Attribute Column
FIXED:\nshow column extras in templates/pdf/table.html, adjusted spacing

ADDED:
Support for integrated labels
Ability to restore default values
CHANGED:
Compatibility with Magento 2.1, for Magento 2.0 use earlier versions
Columns setting field HtmlId is not random anymore
FIXED:\nMulti store capability of footer blocks
FIXED:\nVersion Number

FIXED:
Allow setting of currency for table columns
Compatibility with Magento 2.1.0-rc1
Page break on table rows
Constant line height on images
CHANGED:
Run footer through template engine
FIXED:\nComposer.json for registration and dependency declaration of core modules\nM2 code style
FIXED:\nExtra second composer.json to support Magento Setup UI
FIXED:\nCode Style improvements
CHANGED:\nInitial Release for Magento 2

CHANGED:
Package changed into a Metapackage - Implementation moved into fooman/sameorderinvoicenumber-implementation-m2 package
Semantic versioning will only be applied to the implementation package
ADDED:
Support for Magento 2.3

CHANGED:
Reorganised unit tests
FIXED:
Shipment Integration test for Magento 2.2.5
ADDED:\nSupport for PHP 7.1\nSupport for Magento 2.2.0
FIXED:\nUpdate functional tests to work with 2.1.0-rc1
FIXED:\nWiden Dependency Definition to work with 2.1.0
CHANGED:\nMove dependencies in right location in composer.json\nAdd integration tests
FIXES:\nresource_ids updated to work with new Magento Core module names
FIXES:\nregistration.php was missing from autoload
CHANGED:\nChange project folder structure to src/ and tests/
ADDED:\nInitial release for Magento 2
